title: Should I directly learn C++ rather than learning C first? - Quora

response.answer_text: The answer is No, you should learn c first before learning c++, because c language clears most of the concepts which are include in c++ like decision control, functions,string etc. After learning c language when you goes to C++ you'll be easy to learn the concepts of c++ becouse majority of concepts you cleared in c language and you've just to learn the syntax of it.

You can but I won't recommended you to do so! Since C is a middle level language it provides you the base to learn any other high level language. If you directly start learning C++ without any prior programing language learning then you might find difficulties in various topics such as OOPS, in line functions etc
